title: New Fizz Build Toplane
body:
I get bored of all these assains with the new item duskblade of draktharr oneshoting you without any problem so i`ve tested sth.
I main fizz and wanted to test the item on him. But thats not everything. I`ve played him toplane with a complete new build comming in my head.And here it is:

Trinity,Guinsoo`s,Duskblade,nashoors thooth,cdboots, and last item i bought steraks, but u can be creative with that :D

Sry for my bad english, but with this message i just wanted to bring u on new thougts and i hope u like my build which sounds a bit strange :D

Feel free to test it :D GL and HF!!

replies.body: Du kannst auch Deutsch schreiben, wenn dein Englisch nicht so gut ist.
